name: Hirsch, Appellant, v. Bunker Hill Mutual Insurance Co.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Beimel of the court below, reported in 8 D. & C. 2d 259.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

Hirsch, Appellant, v. Bunker Hill Mutual Insurance Co.
